titleInfo.title: Complexes of anionic polysacchardies with metal salts. Part IV. λ-Carrageenan

name.affiliation: Institute of Chemistry, University of Education, Armii Krajowej 13/15, 42 201 Czêstochowa, Poland.

mods.abstract: Properties of λ-carrageenan complexes with paramagnetic transition metal cations [Co (II), Cu (II), Fe(III), Mn (II),and Ni (II)] were evaluated using the EPR spectrometry, conductivity measurements, thermogravimetric (TG), and differential scanning calorimetric (DSC) studies as well as computations with involvement of the ZINDO-1 method. The formation of the Werner-type complexes with metal central atom and polysaccharide as the ligand was proven. Ligation of the central atom involved lone electron pairs of the polysaccharide hydroxyl groups and the SO3- groups of carrageenan.
